<h1 class="title toc-ignore">Performance comparison with other functional diversity packages</h1>



<p>This vignette presents some performance tests ran between <code>fundiversity</code> and other functional diversity packages. Note that to avoid the dependency on other packages, this vignette is <a href="https://ropensci.org/technotes/2019/12/08/precompute-vignettes/"><strong>pre-computed</strong></a>.</p>
<div id="other-packages-to-compute-fd-indices" class="section level1">
<h1>Other packages to compute FD indices</h1>
<div id="main-functions" class="section level2">
<h2>Main functions</h2>
<p><strong><code>FD::dbFD()</code></strong> is probably the most known function to compute functional diversity indices. It comes from the <code>FD</code> package proposed by <span class="citation">Laliberté, Legendre, and Shipley (2014)</span>. It can compute many indices: functional richness, Rao’s quadratic entropy, community-weighted mean, functional divergence, functional dispersion, and functional group richness. This swiss-army knife of functional diversity indices has many options and compute several indices in a single run.</p>
<p><strong><code>hillR::hill_func()</code></strong> comes from the <code>hillR</code> package that computes Hill numbers for taxonomic, functional, and functional diversity <span class="citation">(Li 2018)</span>. It implements indices proposed by <span class="citation">Chao, Chiu, and Jost (2014)</span>. It computes Rao’s quadratic entropy, the mean functional diversity per species, as well as the total functional diversity.</p>
<p><strong><code>adiv::QE()</code></strong> comes from the <code>adiv</code> package which proposes a toolkit to analyze biodiversity <span class="citation">(Pavoine 2020)</span>. This function computes Rao’s quadratic entropy.</p>
<p><strong><code>SYNCSA::rao.diversity()</code></strong> comes from <code>SYNCSA</code> package which proposes a simulation framework for meta-communities <span class="citation">(Debastiani and Pillar 2012)</span>. The function computes Rao’s quadratic entropy as well as functional redundancy.</p>
</div>
<div id="benchmark-between-packages" class="section level2">
<h2>Benchmark between packages</h2>
<p>We will now benchmark the functions included in <code>fundiversity</code> with the corresponding function in other packages using the <code>microbenchmark::microbenchmark()</code> function.</p>
<div class="sourceCode" id="cb1"><pre class="sourceCode r"><code class="sourceCode r"><span id="cb1-1"><a href="#cb1-1" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>tictoc<span class="sc">::</span><span class="fu">tic</span>()</span>
<span id="cb1-2"><a href="#cb1-2" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a><span class="fu">library</span>(fundiversity)</span>
<span id="cb1-3"><a href="#cb1-3" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a><span class="fu">data</span>(<span class="st">&quot;traits_birds&quot;</span>, <span class="at">package =</span> <span class="st">&quot;fundiversity&quot;</span>)</span>
<span id="cb1-4"><a href="#cb1-4" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a><span class="fu">data</span>(<span class="st">&quot;site_sp_birds&quot;</span>, <span class="at">package =</span> <span class="st">&quot;fundiversity&quot;</span>)</span>
<span id="cb1-5"><a href="#cb1-5" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a></span>
<span id="cb1-6"><a href="#cb1-6" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>dist_traits_birds <span class="ot">&lt;-</span> <span class="fu">dist</span>(traits_birds)</span></code></pre></div>
<p>With the fairly small (~220 species, 8 sites, 4 traits) provided dataset in <code>fundiversity</code>:</p>
<div class="sourceCode" id="cb2"><pre class="sourceCode r"><code class="sourceCode r"><span id="cb2-1"><a href="#cb2-1" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>pkg_bench <span class="ot">&lt;-</span> microbenchmark<span class="sc">::</span><span class="fu">microbenchmark</span>(</span>
<span id="cb2-2"><a href="#cb2-2" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>  <span class="at">fundiversity =</span> {</span>
<span id="cb2-3"><a href="#cb2-3" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>    fundiversity<span class="sc">::</span><span class="fu">fd_raoq</span>(<span class="at">traits =</span> <span class="cn">NULL</span>, site_sp_birds, dist_traits_birds)</span>
<span id="cb2-4"><a href="#cb2-4" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>  },</span>
<span id="cb2-5"><a href="#cb2-5" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>  <span class="at">adiv =</span> {</span>
<span id="cb2-6"><a href="#cb2-6" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>    adiv<span class="sc">::</span><span class="fu">QE</span>(site_sp_birds, <span class="at">dis =</span> dist_traits_birds)</span>
<span id="cb2-7"><a href="#cb2-7" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>  },</span>
<span id="cb2-8"><a href="#cb2-8" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>  <span class="at">hillR =</span> {</span>
<span id="cb2-9"><a href="#cb2-9" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>    hillR<span class="sc">::</span><span class="fu">hill_func</span>(site_sp_birds, dist_traits_birds, <span class="at">traits_as_is =</span> <span class="cn">TRUE</span>)[<span class="dv">1</span>, ]</span>
<span id="cb2-10"><a href="#cb2-10" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>  },</span>
<span id="cb2-11"><a href="#cb2-11" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>  <span class="at">SYNCSA =</span> {</span>
<span id="cb2-12"><a href="#cb2-12" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>    SYNCSA<span class="sc">::</span><span class="fu">rao.diversity</span>(site_sp_birds,</span>
<span id="cb2-13"><a href="#cb2-13" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>                          <span class="at">phylodist =</span> <span class="fu">as.matrix</span>(dist_traits_birds),</span>
<span id="cb2-14"><a href="#cb2-14" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>                          <span class="at">standardize =</span> <span class="cn">FALSE</span>)<span class="sc">$</span>PhyRao</span>
<span id="cb2-15"><a href="#cb2-15" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>  },</span>
<span id="cb2-16"><a href="#cb2-16" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>  <span class="at">FD =</span> {</span>
<span id="cb2-17"><a href="#cb2-17" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>    <span class="fu">suppressMessages</span>(</span>
<span id="cb2-18"><a href="#cb2-18" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>      FD<span class="sc">::</span><span class="fu">dbFD</span>(<span class="at">x =</span> dist_traits_birds, <span class="at">a =</span> site_sp_birds, <span class="at">stand.x =</span> <span class="cn">FALSE</span>,</span>
<span id="cb2-19"><a href="#cb2-19" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>               <span class="at">calc.FRic =</span> <span class="cn">TRUE</span>, <span class="at">calc.CWM =</span> <span class="cn">FALSE</span>, <span class="at">calc.FDiv =</span> <span class="cn">FALSE</span>,</span>
<span id="cb2-20"><a href="#cb2-20" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>               <span class="at">calc.FGR =</span> <span class="cn">FALSE</span>, <span class="at">m =</span> <span class="st">&quot;max&quot;</span>, <span class="at">stand.FRic =</span> <span class="cn">FALSE</span>,</span>
<span id="cb2-21"><a href="#cb2-21" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>               <span class="at">messages =</span> <span class="cn">FALSE</span>))</span>
<span id="cb2-22"><a href="#cb2-22" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>  },</span>
<span id="cb2-23"><a href="#cb2-23" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>  <span class="at">times =</span> <span class="dv">30</span></span>
<span id="cb2-24"><a href="#cb2-24" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>)</span>
<span id="cb2-25"><a href="#cb2-25" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a></span>
<span id="cb2-26"><a href="#cb2-26" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>ggplot2<span class="sc">::</span><span class="fu">autoplot</span>(pkg_bench)</span></code></pre></div>
<div class="figure">
<img src="data:image/png;base64," alt />
<p class="caption">Performance comparison in computing Rao’s quadratic entropy between <code>fundiversity</code> and other packages</p>
</div>
<div class="sourceCode" id="cb3"><pre class="sourceCode r"><code class="sourceCode r"><span id="cb3-1"><a href="#cb3-1" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>pkg_bench</span>
<span id="cb3-2"><a href="#cb3-2" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a><span class="co">#&gt; Unit: milliseconds</span></span>
<span id="cb3-3"><a href="#cb3-3" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a><span class="co">#&gt;          expr         min          lq       mean      median          uq        max neval cld</span></span>
<span id="cb3-4"><a href="#cb3-4" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a><span class="co">#&gt;  fundiversity    2.339107    2.679755    2.86275    2.844036    3.091743    3.67650    30 a  </span></span>

<span id="cb3-6"><a href="#cb3-6" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a><span class="co">#&gt;         hillR   20.962736   21.871550   25.47572   23.721294   26.186873   39.93380    30 a  </span></span>
<span id="cb3-7"><a href="#cb3-7" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a><span class="co">#&gt;        SYNCSA   99.656210  107.666750  127.10731  111.566921  153.724931  172.40455    30  b </span></span>
<span id="cb3-8"><a href="#cb3-8" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a><span class="co">#&gt;            FD 3707.559225 3757.548520 3824.34691 3803.413993 3846.068130 4452.37957    30   c</span></span></code></pre></div>
</div>
</div>
<div id="benchmark-within-fundiversity" class="section level1">
<h1>Benchmark within <code>fundiversity</code></h1>
<p>We now proceed to the performance evaluation of functions within <code>fundiversity</code> with datasets of increasing sizes.</p>
<div id="increasing-the-number-of-species" class="section level2">
<h2>Increasing the number of species</h2>
<div class="sourceCode" id="cb4"><pre class="sourceCode r"><code class="sourceCode r"><span id="cb4-1"><a href="#cb4-1" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>make_more_sp <span class="ot">&lt;-</span> <span class="cf">function</span>(n) {</span>
<span id="cb4-2"><a href="#cb4-2" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>  traits <span class="ot">&lt;-</span> <span class="fu">do.call</span>(rbind, <span class="fu">replicate</span>(n, traits_birds, <span class="at">simplify =</span> <span class="cn">FALSE</span>))</span>
<span id="cb4-3"><a href="#cb4-3" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>  <span class="fu">row.names</span>(traits) <span class="ot">&lt;-</span> <span class="fu">paste0</span>(<span class="st">&quot;sp&quot;</span>, <span class="fu">seq_len</span>(<span class="fu">nrow</span>(traits)))</span>
<span id="cb4-4"><a href="#cb4-4" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a></span>
<span id="cb4-5"><a href="#cb4-5" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>  site_sp <span class="ot">&lt;-</span> <span class="fu">do.call</span>(cbind, <span class="fu">replicate</span>(n, site_sp_birds, <span class="at">simplify =</span> <span class="cn">FALSE</span>))</span>
<span id="cb4-6"><a href="#cb4-6" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>  <span class="fu">colnames</span>(site_sp) <span class="ot">&lt;-</span> <span class="fu">paste0</span>(<span class="st">&quot;sp&quot;</span>, <span class="fu">seq_len</span>(<span class="fu">ncol</span>(site_sp)))</span>
<span id="cb4-7"><a href="#cb4-7" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a></span>
<span id="cb4-8"><a href="#cb4-8" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>  <span class="fu">list</span>(<span class="at">tr =</span> traits, <span class="at">si =</span> site_sp)</span>
<span id="cb4-9"><a href="#cb4-9" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>}</span>
<span id="cb4-10"><a href="#cb4-10" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a></span>
<span id="cb4-11"><a href="#cb4-11" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>null_sp_1000   <span class="ot">&lt;-</span> <span class="fu">make_more_sp</span>(<span class="dv">5</span>)</span>
<span id="cb4-12"><a href="#cb4-12" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>null_sp_10000  <span class="ot">&lt;-</span> <span class="fu">make_more_sp</span>(<span class="dv">50</span>)</span>
<span id="cb4-13"><a href="#cb4-13" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>null_sp_100000 <span class="ot">&lt;-</span> <span class="fu">make_more_sp</span>(<span class="dv">500</span>)</span></code></pre></div>
<div id="functional-richness" class="section level3">
<h3>Functional Richness</h3>
<div class="sourceCode" id="cb5"><pre class="sourceCode r"><code class="sourceCode r"><span id="cb5-1"><a href="#cb5-1" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>bench_sp_fric <span class="ot">&lt;-</span> microbenchmark<span class="sc">::</span><span class="fu">microbenchmark</span>(</span>
<span id="cb5-2"><a href="#cb5-2" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>  <span class="at">species_200    =</span> <span class="fu">fd_fric</span>(     traits_birds, site_sp_birds),</span>

<span id="cb5-5"><a href="#cb5-5" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>  <span class="at">species_100000 =</span> <span class="fu">fd_fric</span>(null_sp_100000<span class="sc">$</span>tr, null_sp_100000<span class="sc">$</span>si),</span>
<span id="cb5-6"><a href="#cb5-6" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>  <span class="at">times =</span> <span class="dv">30</span></span>

<span id="cb5-9"><a href="#cb5-9" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>ggplot2<span class="sc">::</span><span class="fu">autoplot</span>(bench_sp_fric)</span></code></pre></div>

<span id="cb7-6"><a href="#cb7-6" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>  <span class="at">times =</span> <span class="dv">30</span></span>

<span id="cb7-8"><a href="#cb7-8" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a></span>
<span id="cb7-9"><a href="#cb7-9" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>ggplot2<span class="sc">::</span><span class="fu">autoplot</span>(bench_sp_fdiv)</span></code></pre></div>

<span id="cb11-2"><a href="#cb11-2" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>  <span class="at">species_200    =</span> <span class="fu">fd_feve</span>(     traits_birds, site_sp_birds),</span>

<div id="comparing-between-indices" class="section level3">
<h3>Comparing between indices</h3>
<div class="sourceCode" id="cb13"><pre class="sourceCode r"><code class="sourceCode r"><span id="cb13-1"><a href="#cb13-1" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>all_bench_sp <span class="ot">&lt;-</span> <span class="fu">list</span>(<span class="at">fric =</span> bench_sp_fric,</span>
<span id="cb13-2"><a href="#cb13-2" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>                     <span class="at">fdiv =</span> bench_sp_fdiv,</span>
<span id="cb13-3"><a href="#cb13-3" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>                     <span class="at">raoq =</span> bench_sp_raoq,</span>
<span id="cb13-4"><a href="#cb13-4" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>                     <span class="at">feve =</span> bench_sp_feve) <span class="sc">%&gt;%</span></span>
<span id="cb13-5"><a href="#cb13-5" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>  <span class="fu">bind_rows</span>(<span class="at">.id =</span> <span class="st">&quot;fd_index&quot;</span>) <span class="sc">%&gt;%</span></span>
<span id="cb13-6"><a href="#cb13-6" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>  <span class="fu">mutate</span>(<span class="at">n_sp =</span> <span class="fu">gsub</span>(<span class="st">&quot;species_&quot;</span>, <span class="st">&quot;&quot;</span>, expr) <span class="sc">%&gt;%</span></span>
<span id="cb13-7"><a href="#cb13-7" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>           <span class="fu">as.numeric</span>())</span>
<span id="cb13-8"><a href="#cb13-8" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a></span>
<span id="cb13-9"><a href="#cb13-9" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>all_bench_sp <span class="sc">%&gt;%</span></span>
<span id="cb13-10"><a href="#cb13-10" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>  <span class="fu">ggplot</span>(<span class="fu">aes</span>(n_sp, time <span class="sc">*</span> <span class="fl">1e-9</span>, <span class="at">color =</span> fd_index)) <span class="sc">+</span></span>
<span id="cb13-11"><a href="#cb13-11" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>  <span class="fu">geom_point</span>(<span class="at">alpha =</span> <span class="dv">1</span><span class="sc">/</span><span class="dv">3</span>) <span class="sc">+</span></span>
<span id="cb13-12"><a href="#cb13-12" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>  <span class="fu">geom_smooth</span>() <span class="sc">+</span></span>
<span id="cb13-13"><a href="#cb13-13" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>  <span class="fu">scale_x_log10</span>() <span class="sc">+</span></span>
<span id="cb13-14"><a href="#cb13-14" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>  <span class="fu">scale_y_log10</span>() <span class="sc">+</span></span>
<span id="cb13-15"><a href="#cb13-15" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>  <span class="fu">scale_color_brewer</span>(<span class="at">type =</span> <span class="st">&quot;qual&quot;</span>,</span>
<span id="cb13-16"><a href="#cb13-16" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>                     <span class="at">labels =</span> <span class="fu">c</span>(<span class="at">fric =</span> <span class="st">&quot;FRic&quot;</span>, <span class="at">fdiv =</span> <span class="st">&quot;FDiv&quot;</span>, <span class="at">raoq =</span> <span class="st">&quot;Rao&#39;s Q&quot;</span>,</span>
<span id="cb13-17"><a href="#cb13-17" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>                                <span class="at">feve =</span> <span class="st">&quot;FEve&quot;</span>)) <span class="sc">+</span></span>
<span id="cb13-18"><a href="#cb13-18" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>  <span class="fu">labs</span>(<span class="at">title =</span> <span class="st">&quot;Performance comparison between indices&quot;</span>,</span>
<span id="cb13-19"><a href="#cb13-19" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>       <span class="at">x =</span> <span class="st">&quot;# of species&quot;</span>, <span class="at">y =</span> <span class="st">&quot;Time (in seconds)&quot;</span>,</span>
<span id="cb13-20"><a href="#cb13-20" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>       <span class="at">color =</span> <span class="st">&quot;FD index&quot;</span>) <span class="sc">+</span></span>

<span id="cb46-4"><a href="#cb46-4" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a></span>
<span id="cb46-5"><a href="#cb46-5" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>  site_sp</span>
<span id="cb46-6"><a href="#cb46-6" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>}</span>

<span id="cb54-4"><a href="#cb54-4" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a><span class="co">#&gt;     sites_10    10.82708    11.07722    11.53401    11.42092    11.75125    12.79826    30 a  </span></span>
<span id="cb54-5"><a href="#cb54-5" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a><span class="co">#&gt;    sites_100   107.34637   110.09369   146.57728   114.68564   157.27761   756.37596    30 a  </span></span>
<span id="cb54-6"><a href="#cb54-6" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a><span class="co">#&gt;   sites_1000  1082.09198  1168.72524  1278.28016  1255.70507  1273.23958  1849.12083    30  b </span></span>

<div id="comparing-between-indices-1" class="section level3">
<h3>Comparing between indices</h3>
<div class="sourceCode" id="cb55"><pre class="sourceCode r"><code class="sourceCode r"><span id="cb55-1"><a href="#cb55-1" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>all_bench_sites <span class="ot">&lt;-</span> <span class="fu">list</span>(<span class="at">fric =</span> bench_sites_fric,</span>
<span id="cb55-2"><a href="#cb55-2" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>                        <span class="at">fdiv =</span> bench_sites_fdiv,</span>
<span id="cb55-3"><a href="#cb55-3" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>                        <span class="at">raoq =</span> bench_sites_raoq,</span>
<span id="cb55-4"><a href="#cb55-4" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>                        <span class="at">feve =</span> bench_sites_feve) <span class="sc">%&gt;%</span></span>
<span id="cb55-5"><a href="#cb55-5" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>  <span class="fu">bind_rows</span>(<span class="at">.id =</span> <span class="st">&quot;fd_index&quot;</span>) <span class="sc">%&gt;%</span></span>
<span id="cb55-6"><a href="#cb55-6" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>  <span class="fu">mutate</span>(<span class="at">n_sites =</span> <span class="fu">gsub</span>(<span class="st">&quot;sites&quot;</span>, <span class="st">&quot;&quot;</span>, expr) <span class="sc">%&gt;%</span></span>
<span id="cb55-7"><a href="#cb55-7" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>           <span class="fu">as.numeric</span>())</span></code></pre></div>
<pre class="collapsable-warnings"><code>#&gt; Warning: Problem with `mutate()` input `n_sites`.
#&gt; ℹ NAs introduced by coercion
#&gt; ℹ Input `n_sites` is `gsub(&quot;sites&quot;, &quot;&quot;, expr) %&gt;% as.numeric()`.

all_bench_sites %&gt;%
  ggplot(aes(n_sites, time * 1e-9, color = fd_index)) +
  geom_point(alpha = 1/3) +
  geom_smooth() +
  scale_x_log10() +
  scale_y_log10() +
  scale_color_brewer(type = &quot;qual&quot;,
                     labels = c(fric = &quot;FRic&quot;, fdiv = &quot;FDiv&quot;, raoq = &quot;Rao&#39;s Q&quot;,
                                feve = &quot;FEve&quot;)) +
  labs(title = &quot;Performance comparison between indices&quot;,
       x = &quot;# of sites&quot;, y = &quot;Time (in seconds)&quot;,
       color = &quot;FD index&quot;) +
  theme_bw() +
  theme(aspect.ratio = 1)</code></pre>
<pre class="collapsable-warnings"><code>#&gt; Warning: Removed 480 rows containing non-finite values (stat_smooth).</code></pre>
